name: Vedova d.o.o.
goal:
Vedova d.o.o. is a consultancy that specialises in taking creative and digital businesses to the next level. We work with every company mainly in business development and public affairs, through coaching, web development, marketing strategy, digital and media, advertising, business strategy and changing legislation.

Vedova d.o.o. as well as having extensive commercial experience within the creative sector, have specific expertise in rights, business development, web development, marketing, advertising, strategy, PR, strategic branding and public affairs. Success breeds success.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Enterprise, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Tax, Audit & Accounting, Financial Services and Digital Single Market, including advertising and marketing regulations, broadcasting. Data Security, cyber security, protection of business secrets and privacy.
